dataGroup.data: Compact, Lightweight Telephoto Zoom Lens, LUMIX G VARIO 45-150mm/F4.0-5.6 ASPH./MEGA O.I.S.
A Compact and Lightweight Telephoto Zoom Lens
MEGA O.I.S. for Steady Framing at Telephoto Shooting
High-speed and Silent AF with Inner Focus System
7 Blades Circular Aperture Diaphragm for Smoothly Defocused Background
A Compact and Lightweight Telephoto Zoom Lens

Featuring the high mobility thanks to the ultra-compact size and lightweight, the new LUMIX G VARIO 45-150mm/F4.0-5.6 ASPH./MEGA O.I.S. lens offers a versatile zoom range of 45-150 mm (35mm camera equivalent: 90-300mm) suitable for impressive telephoto shot of sports or animals which are physically difficult to come close utilizing rich depth of the field.

Comprising of 12 elements in 9 groups, 1 UHR (Ultra High Refractive Index) lens and 2 aspherical lenses in the LUMIX G VARIO 45-150mm / F4.0-5.6 ASPH./MEGA O.I.S. achieves uniform descriptiveness from the center to the corners for high optical performance while maintaining its size compact.
MEGA O.I.S. for Steady Framing at Telephoto Shooting

The LUMIX G VARIO 45-150mm/4.0-5.6 ASPH./MEGA O.I.S. lens incorporates Panasonic's MEGA O.I.S. (Optical Image Stabilizer), which makes it easy to shoot super clear shots even in low-lit situations by suppressing the blur caused by a hand shake.
High-speed and Silent AF with Inner Focus System

The LUMIX G VARIO 45-150mm/F4.0-5.6 ASPH./MEGA O.I.S. lens incorporates superior inner focus system, which enables excellent resolution and contrast from full life-size magnification to infinity. The inclusion of stepping motor makes the focusing action smooth and silent for use in both photo and video recording. When mounted on the cameras of LUMIX G, users can take advantage of the high-speed, high-precision Contrast AF system.
7 Blades Circular Aperture Diaphragm for Smoothly Defocused Background

The 7 aperture blades consists a circular aperture diaphragm and produces an attractive smoothness in out-of-focus areas even shooting at large aperture. The new lens system uses multi-coated lens elements that reduce ghosts and flare to an absolute minimum, helping deliver a high optical performance.
Micro Four Thirds 45-150mm Telephoto Zoom Lens / 90-300mm (35mm camera equiv.)
LUMIX G VARIO 45-150mm / F4.0-5.6 ASPH. / MEGA O.I.S.
Micro Four Thirds 45-150mm Telephoto Zoom Lens / 90-300mm (35mm camera equiv.)

Approx. 73mm / 2.9 inch (from the tip of the lens to the base side of the lens mount)
